full_description:
XTRA N40 Wireless Bluetooth Neckband

The XTRA N40 Wireless Bluetooth Neckband allows you to enjoy wireless music and calls while remaining comfortable and convenient. It uses Bluetooth 5.3, which provides a durable and quick connection to your devices. It has a frequency response of 20Hz - 20KHz and a sensitivity of 90 dB, resulting in a clean and balanced sound. It includes a microphone and a stereo sound mode, allowing you to chat hands-free while also enjoying immersive music. It contains a 10-mm driver unit that generates deep and strong bass. The XTRA N40 Wireless Bluetooth Neckband is waterproof and has an IPX5 rating, which means it can withstand water splashes and perspiration. It includes a 130 mAh battery that may give up to 15 hours of playtime on a single charge. The XTRA Neckband is lightweight and ergonomic, weighing only 28 grams. It comprises a flexible neckband that wraps tightly around your neck and keeps the earbuds in place. It also has a magnetic Neckband that attaches while not in use, making it simple to store and transport. The XTRA N40 Wireless Bluetooth Neckband is a Neckband that allows you to listen to music and make calls wirelessly and comfortably.

The Bluetooth 5.2 version of the earphone provides a quick and robust wireless connection with your devices. XTRA N50 Bluetooth In Ear Neckband Earphone also contains a magnet adsorption function that allows you to attach the earbuds together while not in use, as well as a volume slider that allows you to effortlessly control the music level. The earphones contains a big 180mAh battery that can last up to 25 hours of call time and music play time, as well as a Type-C connection for quick and easy charging. full_description:
XTRA N25 In-Ear Stereo Wireless Neckband

The XTRA N25 In-Ear Stereo Wireless Neckband, a premium audio companion that delivers an immersive listening experience with exceptional convenience. This sleek and stylish neckband is designed to provide you with the ultimate wireless freedom while ensuring crystal-clear sound quality. The XTRA N25 features 10mm drivers that produce rich, powerful sound with a frequency range spanning from 20Hz to 20kHz. Whether you're enjoying your favorite tunes or engaging in calls, you can expect excellent audio clarity and balanced bass. With Bluetooth V5.2 technology, the XTRA N25 ensures a stable and efficient connection to your devices. Enjoy the convenience of wireless music streaming and hands-free communication without the hassle of tangled wires. Stay connected and communicate effortlessly with the built-in microphone. It allows you to make clear, distortion-free calls, making it a perfect companion for business calls, online meetings, or catching up with friends and family. The earbuds are equipped with magnet adsorption, which not only keeps them securely in place around your neck when not in use but also automatically powers them off to conserve battery life. The XTRA N25 is built to withstand your active lifestyle. With an IPX4 water resistance rating, these earphones can handle splashes of water and sweat, making them suitable for workouts and outdoor activities. Powered by a 90mAh Li-polymer battery, the XTRA N25 ensures an impressive 8 hours of continuous playtime on a single charge. It's ideal for long journeys, extended workout sessions, or just uninterrupted music throughout your day. Recharging the earphones is quick and hassle-free with the Type-C charging port. In just 2 hours, you can fully replenish the battery and be ready to take on your next adventure. With its advanced features, ergonomic design, and impressive sound quality, the XTRA N25 In-Ear Stereo Wireless Neckband is an excellent choice for anyone seeking a reliable and stylish audio accessory. Whether you're a music enthusiast or a professional on the go, these wireless earphones are sure to elevate your listening experience.
